pages.title: Skin system
pages.text: Mobs within a single species may generate with different appearances, different Skins do not prevent crossbreeding between mobs. $(br2)Furthermore, some mobs (eg. Green Arowana) may rarely spawn with flashier skins, by default, 5% of the time.

pages.title: Skins and you
pages.text: Additional Skins may be defined from within a Resource Pack by following the established naming convention: $(br2)Skins suffixed with an underscore followed by a number will be assigned to the common Skin list. $(br2)Skins suffixed with an underscore followed by a number and 'r' will be added to the Rare skins

pages.title: Skins and you: Problems
pages.text: Do note that, if you are playing on Server, both Server and Client must have the same Skins defined, otherwise, abnormal behaviour is likely to happen. $(br2)Skins must also be defined sequentially, starting with 1 and ending in whatever number (up to 99)
